 #Datastorage of sensitive patient data
      - Item 5.1 Storage at AU
            - Item 5.1.1 Patient and trial data (patient sensitive): RedCap
            - Item 5.1.2 Larger data files: O-drive, needs to be setup through AU-IT so that logging is possible. Only pseudonymized patient data.
            - Item 5.1.3 Link to AU datastorage info: https://medarbejdere.au.dk/informationssikkerhed/klassifikation-af-data/#c2545048
      
      - Item 5.2 Storage at RM
            - Item 5.2.1 Patient and trial data (patient sensitive): RedCap through RM
            - Item 5.2.2 Larger data files: MidtX, needs to be setup through RM-IT so that logging is possible.
